Entry.JapaneseText: 俺のせいで、ワルトゥには つらい思いをさせてしまった……
Entry.EnglishText: Walto has suffered due to my actions...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも、ワルトゥとはわかり合えたんだもん。 いいじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: But you and Walto are on the same page now. So it's all good, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……そうだな……この戦いが完ったら、 ゆっくり語り合いたいものだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, you're right... Once this battle is over, I'd like to sit down and catch up with him.

Entry.JapaneseText: その時はボクも呼んでよネ！
Entry.EnglishText: When you do, make sure to invite me, too!
